sentences.en: A little forethought would have saved you much trouble afterwards.
sentences.cn: 如果事先稍微考虑一下的话,就会省掉你以后的许多麻烦了.

sentences.en: An empty refrigerator illustrates a lack of forethought.
sentences.cn: 空空的冰箱说明主人缺乏先见.

sentences.en: Caution: Careful forethought to avoid danger or harm.
sentences.cn: 谨慎: 仔细考虑以避免危险或伤害.

sentences.en: In life, as in chess, forethought wins.
sentences.cn: 人生如下棋, 多思则能胜.

sentences.en: In the end , wisdom and forethought will win.
sentences.cn: 有了智慧和深谋远虑,最终才会赢得胜利.

sentences.en: Prudence is a good thing; forethought is wisdom.
sentences.cn: 谨慎小心是好事; 深谋远虑是明智.

sentences.en: Spoken, done, or composed with little or no preparation or forethought.
sentences.cn: 即席的,即兴的:未经或很少准备或构思而讲的 、 做的或谱写的.

sentences.en: The afterthought is good, But forethought is Better.
sentences.cn: 事后回想有益, 事前考虑更佳.

sentences.en: The headstrong impetuous man rushed into things without forethought.
sentences.cn: 这个顽固的莽汉,不预先考虑,仓促行事.

sentences.en: The moral of this article is that a little forethought can pay off tremendously.
sentences.cn: 本文给我们的启示是：一点点深谋远虑可以带来极大的回报。

sentences.en: The words had come out without forethought.
sentences.cn: 这话未加思考就脱口而出了.

sentences.en: Theresa was struck by her own lack of forethought.
sentences.cn: 特蕾莎强烈意识到自己事先太欠考虑了。

sentences.en: Using encryption takes a bit of forethought.
sentences.cn: 使用加密功能就必须要事先做些准备工作.

sentences.en: With a little forethought many accidents could be avoided.
sentences.cn: 如果事先稍微多想想，许多事故是可以避免的。

sentences.en: With a little more forethought we could have bought the house we really wanted.
sentences.cn: 我们当初若是稍微再多考虑一下,也许就能买到我们真正想要的房子了.

sentences.en: With forethought, that can be built into automated tests.
sentences.cn: 在经过仔细考虑后, 可以将这个过程构建到自动化测试中.

words.tran_cn: 深谋远虑的；有先见之明的
深谋远虑；先见；考虑将来

trans.tran_cn: 事先的考虑[筹划]，远见卓识
